comment: Robert Martinez: Merrill Edge's fees are higher than advertised and their platform lacks important features.
Christopher Rodriguez: I've been using Merrill Edge for over a year and have been very pleased with their service. The trading platform is reliable and customer support is excellent.
Matthew Wilson: My experience with Merrill Edge has been excellent. Their platform is user-friendly and their fees are competitive.
Abigail Jackson: Merrill Edge has consistently provided a top-notch trading experience. Fast executions and great customer service.
Michael Brown: Merrill Edge has consistently provided a top-notch trading experience. Fast executions and great customer service.
